record.title: AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO REPORT
record.narrative:
AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO REPORT -- (Senate - November 16, 2007)

[Page: S14655]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that during the recess or adjournment of the Senate, the Senate committees may file committee-reported legislative and Executive Calendar business on Tuesday, November 27, 2007, during the hours of 10 a.m. to 1 p.m.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
